content:
~~既然没有Pascal的题解，那本蒟蒻来水一发~~
```
var a1,a2,a3,a4,a5,i:longint;
begin
  read(a1,a2,a3);//读入
  for i:=a1 downto 1 do
  begin
    read(a5);//读入
    if (i<=a2) then a4:=a4+a3 else a4:=a4+a5;//贪心算法
  end;
  writeln(a4);//输出
end.
```
